headline: Hold Archer Aviation? Here Is Another Unstoppable Growth Stock and ETF to Buy in April
summary: It takes courage to buy beaten-down growth stocks during a stock market sell-off.  Archer Aviation (NYSE: ACHR) has sparked excitement from investors interested in technology and electric vehicles (EVs).  Industrial automation and robotics giant Rockwell Automation (NYSE: ROK) has seen its valuation fall to compelling levels.
